dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI Stereo dataset consists of 1578 stereo pairs taken from calibrated stereo cameras, designed to illustrate the use case of a calibrated and synchronized camera array.
dcterms:title: KITTI Stereo

dcterms:creator: M. Menze
C. Heipke
A. Geiger
dcterms:description: The KITTI General dataset consists of 789 scenes with 21 stereo pairs per scene taken sequentially, where images are taken from different time steps, simulating a more general case of loosely co-located images.
dcterms:title: KITTI General
